block: ublk: extending queue_size to fix overflow

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.11 by commit ee1e3fe4b4579f856997190a00ea4db0307b4332, it was introduced in version v6.0 by commit 71f28f3136aff5890cd56de78abc673f8393cad9. For more details please see the references link.
